input.sentences: people gathering for a baby shower .
friends and family having a good time outside .
plenty presents for mom to be .
mom to be sitting down opening the gifts .
happy and thankful with the presents received .
output.sentences: Today there was small gathering of people for a baby shower
It was a nice time with friends and family
There were plenty of gifts for the new mom
The mom spent time sitting and opening gifts
She was thankful and happy for everything received.
